info.description: This is a simple API for Recally project.
info.title: Recally API

get.description: Lists the assistants for a user
Lists attachments for a specific assistant

post.description: Uploads an attachment to an assistant

get.description: Lists the threads for an assistant

post.description: Creates a new thread under an assistant

put.description: Updates an existing thread under an assistant

get.description: Lists attachments for a specific thread

post.description: Uploads an attachment to a thread
Generates a title for a thread based on the conversation

get.description: Lists the messages for a thread

post.description: Creates a new message in a specified thread

put.description: Updates a thread message by ID

delete.description: Deletes a thread message by ID

post.description: Authenticate a user with email and password
Clear user session by removing JWT token
Register a new user with the provided username, email, and password

put.description: Update user's username, email, and phone

get.description: Validate the JWT token and return the user ID
Lists bookmarks for a user with pagination

post.description: Creates a new bookmark for the user

delete.description: Deletes all bookmarks for a user

get.description: Lists all domains from user's bookmarks

200.description: Success - Returns array of domains with counts

get.description: Lists all tags for a user's bookmarks

200.description: Success - Returns array of tags with counts

get.description: Gets a specific bookmark by ID

post.description: Refreshes bookmark content and/or regenerates AI summary

get.description: Gets sharing information for a bookmark

put.description: Updates sharing settings for a bookmark

post.description: Creates a shareable link for a bookmark

delete.description: Revokes sharing access for a bookmark

get.description: Get presigned URLs for uploading or downloading files from S3
get.summary: Get presigned URLs for file operations

get.description: Get a redirect to the file's presigned URL

delete.description: Delete a file by its ID

get.description: List all API keys for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new API key for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete an API key by ID

head.description: Get metadata for a shared file without downloading it

tools.description: Tools is a list of tools that the assistant can use
Tools is a list of tools that the assistant can use

httpserver.JSONResult.description: JSONResult represents the structure of the JSON response.

code.description: Code is an integer value that represents the HTTP status code.

data.description: Data is an interface value that represents the data of the response.

error.description: Error is an error value that represents the error of the response.

message.description: Message is a string value that represents the message of the response.

success.description: Success is a boolean value that indicates whether the request was successful.
